title: 84/224/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 January 1984 on the aid provided for in Campania to support the production of apricots (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 11 January 1984
on the aid provided for in Campania to support the production of apricots
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(84/224/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The subsidy of Lit 200 000 per hectare, which is increased to Lit 700 000 per hectare in areas that are especially suited to the production of apricots, provided for in the draft Law of the region of Campania laying down provisions for rationalizing the cultivation of apricots is incompatible with the common market within the meaning of Article 92 of the EEC Treaty.
Consequently, the draft Law may not be adopted and the aid referred to above may not be granted.
Italy shall take the measures necessary to ensure compliance with this Decision. It shall inform the Commission thereof within one month from notification of this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 January 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
